# addEvent(_:at:)

**Instance Method**

Adds a music event to a track at the time you specify.

## Declaration

```swift
func addEvent(_ event: AVMusicEvent, at beat: AVMusicTimeStamp)
```

## Parameters

- **event**: The event to add.
- **beat**: The time to add the event at.

## Discussion

The system copies event contents into the track, so you can add the same event at different timestamps. You can’t add all [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMusicEvent] subclasses to a track.

- You can only add [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVExtendedTempoEvent] and [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIMetaEvent] with certain [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVMIDIMetaEvent/EventType] to a sequencer’s tempo track.
- You can add [doc://com.apple.avfaudio/documentation/AVFAudio/AVParameterEvent] to automation tracks.
- You can’t add other event subclasses to tempo or automation tracks.

## Adding and Clearing Events

- **moveEvents(in:by:)**: Moves the beat location of all events in the given beat range by the amount you specify.
- **clearEvents(in:)**: Removes all events in the given beat range from the music track.
